select project_monthly_report_id, available_central_investment, available_local_investment, available_provincial_investment, backfill, civil_engineering, concrete, construction_content, create_time, difficulty, electromechanical_equipment, environmental_protection, grout, hole_dug, independent_cost, labour_force, masonry, measure, metal_mechanism, open_dug, other_cost, rebar, remark, resettlement_arrangement, source_central_investment, source_local_investment, source_provincial_investment, submit_date, submitter, suggestion, temporary_work, visual_progress, water_conservation, base_info_id, statistical_leader, update_time from project_monthly_report

SELECT pmr.project_monthly_report_id, pmr.available_central_investment, pmr.available_local_investment, pmr.available_provincial_investment, pmr.backfill, pmr.civil_engineering, pmr.concrete, pmr.construction_content, pmr.create_time, pmr.difficulty, pmr.electromechanical_equipment, pmr.environmental_protection, pmr.grout, pmr.hole_dug, pmr.independent_cost, pmr.labour_force, pmr.masonry, pmr.measure, pmr.metal_mechanism, pmr.open_dug, pmr.other_cost, pmr.rebar, pmr.remark, pmr.resettlement_arrangement, pmr.source_central_investment, pmr.source_local_investment, pmr.source_provincial_investment, pmr.submit_date, pmr.submitter, pmr.suggestion, pmr.temporary_work, pmr.visual_progress, pmr.water_conservation, pmr.base_info_id, pmr.statistical_leader, pmr.update_time, pmri.project_monthly_report_img_id pmri_project_monthly_report_img_id, pmri.create_time pmri_create_time, pmri.img_addr pmri_img_addr, pmri.img_desc pmri_img_desc, pmri.project_monthly_report_id pmri_project_monthly_report_id from project_monthly_report pmr LEFT JOIN project_monthly_report_img pmri ON pmr.project_monthly_report_id = pmri.project_monthly_report_id
AND pmr.project_monthly_report_id = #{projectMonthlyReportId}
